channel.title: Slices on Embrace Change, Shape the Future
channel.description: Recent content in Slices on Embrace Change, Shape the Future

item.title: Tideland Go Slices v0.1.1
item.description: So far I had not missed generics in Go. Much could be solved via interfaces or closures. And with the disgusting syntactic aberrations of other languages when dealing with generics, I was rather afraid that the elegant simplicity of Go could be lost. As of Go 1.18, Google’s language now handles generics after much discussion. I have always appreciated the implicit simplicity with which, for example, types in a statement like
